headline: Tyler Technologies (TYL): Assessing Valuation After a 26% Slide Despite Ongoing Profit Growth
summary: Tyler Technologies stock steadies after extended slide Tyler Technologies (TYL) is trying to find its footing after a weak stretch that has seen the stock fall about 26% over the past year and roughly 16% in the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Tyler Technologies. That slide has come even as Tyler continues to post solid double digit net income growth. This suggests the weak year to date share price return reflects shifting sentiment on valuation more than fundamentals, with longer...

headline: How TD Cowen’s Upbeat Initiation and Homestead Cloud Win At Tyler Technologies (TYL) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: TD Cowen recently initiated coverage on Tyler Technologies with a positive rating, while the company completed an on-time, within-budget rollout of its AWS-powered Enterprise Permitting & Licensing cloud platform for the City of Homestead, Florida. Together with growing demand for modernized government payment and permitting systems, these developments highlight Tyler’s role as a key technology partner in public sector digitization. Next, we’ll examine how TD Cowen’s upbeat initiation and...
